foods.name: អាម៉ុកត្រី
foods.description: A traditional Khmer dish made with fish, coconut milk, and a blend of spices, steamed in banana leaves. It's creamy, aromatic, and mildly spicy, offering a unique taste of Cambodian cuisine.

foods.name: បាយសាច់ជ្រូក
foods.description: A popular breakfast dish in Cambodia, featuring grilled pork served with broken rice, often accompanied by pickled vegetables and a light broth.

foods.name: នំបញ្ចុក
foods.description: A traditional Khmer noodle soup with rice noodles, green curry, fish, and fresh herbs. Known as 'Khmer noodles,' it is commonly enjoyed as a breakfast dish.

foods.name: ឡុកឡាក់
foods.description: Tender stir-fried beef served on a bed of lettuce, tomatoes, and cucumbers, typically accompanied by a pepper-lime dipping sauce.

foods.name: សម្លកកូរ
foods.description: A hearty vegetable stew featuring fish, banana flowers, and a variety of green vegetables, seasoned with prahok (fermented fish paste) for an authentic Khmer flavor.

foods.name: សម្លម្ជូរជ្រូក
foods.description: A sour soup with pork, pineapple, tomatoes, and tamarind for a tangy and refreshing flavor.

foods.name: បាយឆាសាច់មាន់
foods.description: Fried rice with chicken, seasoned with soy sauce and garlic, served with fresh vegetables.

foods.name: គុយទាវសាច់គោ
foods.description: A hearty noodle soup with beef, garnished with fresh herbs and bean sprouts.

foods.name: សម្លកកូរសាច់ជ្រូក
foods.description: A traditional beef curry with coconut milk, vegetables, and Khmer spices, served with rice.

foods.name: សាច់ជ្រូកចៀន
foods.description: Deep-fried pork belly, crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside, served with pickled vegetables.

foods.name: បាយសាច់មាន់
foods.description: Steamed rice with grilled chicken, served with a side of sweet and spicy dipping sauce.

foods.name: ត្រីចៀន
foods.description: Stir-fried fish with ginger, garlic, and soy sauce, served with steamed rice.

foods.name: បបរមាន់
foods.description: Chicken porridge, a light and comforting breakfast dish, perfect with fresh herbs.

foods.name: បាយសាច់គោ
foods.description: Steamed rice with stir-fried beef and vegetables, seasoned with soy sauce.

foods.name: សម្លប្រហើរមាន់
foods.description: A clear chicken soup with lemongrass, galangal, and lime leaves, served with rice.

foods.name: សម្លដើមចេក
foods.description: Banana flower soup made with coconut milk, dried fish, and Khmer spices for a creamy and earthy flavor.

foods.name: អាំងត្រីរ៉ស់
foods.description: Grilled snakehead fish seasoned with lemongrass, garlic, and lime, served with fresh vegetables.

foods.name: ស្លាបមាន់ចៀន
foods.description: Crispy fried chicken wings marinated with garlic and soy sauce, served with chili sauce.

foods.name: មាន់ដុត
foods.description: Crispy fried chicken thighs served with pickled carrots and radish.

foods.name: បាយឆាម្ជូរទ្រី
foods.description: Fried rice with fish paste, topped with fresh herbs and lime wedges.
